definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Shop windows were shattered. Cars were smashed.
sentences.chinese: 商店玻璃破碎，汽車被砸毀，大量傷者躺在街頭。

sentences.english: Most of the injured were women and children.
sentences.chinese: 大多數受傷者都是婦女和兒童。

sentences.english: The injured man levered himself up on his elbow.
sentences.chinese: 受傷者靠肘部費勁地擡起身子。

sentences.english: The men, who included four guards, were injured by rubber bullets and machetes.
sentences.chinese: 包括4名警衛在內的傷者因橡膠彈和大砍刀而受傷。

sentences.english: Disentangle the person's feet from the wreckage and bring the feet foward to exit.
sentences.chinese: 將傷者的腳從殘骸中解脫出來，並移至靠近出口處。

sentences.english: He says at least 1, 093 people were injured in the clashes.
sentences.chinese: 他說衝突的傷者超過了1093人。

sentences.english: Yesterday a truck full of injured people arrived.
sentences.chinese: 昨天就有一輛貨車拉來一車傷者。

sentences.english: Five of the injured had multiple gunshot wounds.
sentences.chinese: 其中有五個受傷者身中多槍。

sentences.english: Some of them were reported among the dead and injured.
sentences.chinese: 據報道，其中死傷者中包括這些禮拜者。

sentences.english: Another injury was reported in Wenxian County of the northwestern Gansu Province, which borders Qingchuan.
sentences.chinese: 另一名傷者在甘肅西北部與青川接壤的文縣。

sentences.english: The wounded were brought to the hospital.
All the dead and injured were burned beyond recognition.
sentences.chinese: 所有的死者和傷者都被燒得面目全非。

sentences.english: Some of the injured were evacuated from the Taj on luggage carts.
sentences.chinese: 一些傷者被放在行李車上，從泰姬陵酒店撤離。

sentences.english: Opening the man's clothing, the emperor and hermit saw that the man had received a deep gash.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝和智者解開傷者的衣服，發現他身受重傷。

sentences.english: There were alot of dead and wounded everywhere and alot of the groups were dragging and carrying wounded.
sentences.chinese: 到處都是陣亡者和傷者，許多人正在擡運傷者。

definition: to sound an alarm/to report sth to the police
